newsitem.title: USA: Old Guard completes conversion to stock company.
newsitem.headline: Old Guard completes conversion to stock company.

text.p: Old Guard Group Inc said Friday that Old Guard Mutual Insurance Co, Old Guard Mutual Fire Insurance Co and Goschenhoppen-Home Mutual Insurance Co completed their conversion from separate mutually-owned companies to a single stock corporation.

The conversion was approved at special meetings of the policyholders on Feb 11. Old Guard Group said it will make an announcement in the near future regarding the date Old Guard stock will begin trading.
The company said it has sold about 3,955,000 shares of common stock at $10 per share to policyholders and an employee stock ownership plan.
The conversion is the first of a financially sound mutual insurance company to stock form under Pennsylvania's new Mutual to Stock Conversion Act.
